Message:
To save the world,
I thought our journey would
be full of pain and hardships.

It’s unforgivable to have fun
while saving the world.

We have to undergo
the pain and hardships.

But...with those gentle eyes of his,
he noticed how I was changing
for the worse.

Then, a trial that was
meant for me to face alone
became something shared
by the two of us.

Half of my pain disappeared,
then the next thing I knew,
it was completely gone.

With him and so many friends
lending me their hands,

this journey of pain and
hardships turned into one
full of fun and joy.

Our journey will one day
come to an end.

That’s something I should’ve
known all along.

Still lacking the strength
to say goodbye,

the end of our journey
appeared right before
my very eyes.
